'''Passing of Judgment''' is an [[Arcane Legend Card|Arcane Legend]] [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This card does not stop the opponent from spending Elemental Dice to play Event Cards, but it nullifies the effects of those cards. This effect extends to Arcane Legend Cards, as they are all also Event Cards.

==Story==
{{Description|"It is time to make the final decision on this case."|title=Passing of Judgment}}
